page.title: 19My weekend at Parkend.
page.content:
On a weekend I wake at 8.30am have, breakfast and watch television for an hour. My friend, Paul Watkins, comes down to my house to play. We sometimes
fish down a little stream near to our house in Parkend.The fish we catch are pretty small and mostly they are Brown Trout. At 6,0clock we go swimming at Heywood Comprehensive school,Cinderford.Only Parkend people and a few outsiders go as it is a private session.We have fish and chips, watch television and go to bed at 10,0,clock.On Sunday we have our "Sunday Dinner" which is frozen peas, roast meat, carrots, potatoes and gravy.After dinner we usually visit our relations for tea. Ian Burrows Aged 10 Years.
